name: ecommerce-fullstack
description: Fullstack E-commerce application with Next.js frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.db:push: cd server && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd server && npx prisma db seed
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client

author: Didi Anasfudi
